review.name: Really cute, fun, entertaining, and educational video
review.reviewBody: Wow! This is a really cute, fun, entertaining, and educational video. I said that because I watch this on DVD with my 17-month-old nephew from time to time. If I had to pick, this would be the cutest one. This is because it's really cute, fun, entertaining, and educational. Still, I think that all the Baby Einstein videos are really cute, fun, entertaining, and educational. Before I wrap this up, I'd like to say that the Baby Einstein company really knows how to reach a toddler's developing mind. Now, in conclusion, if you have children, nieces, or nephews, I strongly recommend this really cute, fun, entertaining, and educational video.
